text:
The primary cryptocurrency supported on the aelf blockchain is the ELF token. This token has several functions within the aelf ecosystem, including governance, resource allocation, and staking.As aelf is a multi-chain network with various dAppChains, users can unlock utility with other tokens specific to dApps built on the aelf ecosystem, such as AwakenSwap, Portkey, and Project Schrodinger. Here are some of the supported tokens and stablecoins:
ELF
USDT
BNB
DAI
ETH
SGR
USDC
title: Which crypto is supported on aelf?
